title: How many people still love Indian pop and want to form a band? - Quora

response.answer_text: I love to answer this Ahh so, I love Indian pop and I want to make a band too. cause, when I listened to viva it sounded good and just thought for a moment that why it disbanded and of course becoz of Bollywood And seriously, I love to listen their music coz I love it. Now I am trying to sing their songs also 😊😊 And I love Indian pop.

I love Indian pop music too. Indie-pop suffered due to a lot of reasons: Bollywood playback singing taking the marketReality singing showsNew forms of music emerging I.e. rock, metal etcNot popular in extremely rural areasNon invention I.e. normally the bands which gained attention later such as Underground Authority or Bloodywood have a rapper and two guitarists. Others did not pick upIncrease in feature cultureI know how to play mobile application based octopad (not the real one) though.
